title: Case-Based Collaborative Learning Program to Improve Preservice Teachers’ Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of instructional theories and foundational concepts in curriculum design
context.additional_context: Simulating real classroom scenarios in VR environments while providing digital collaboration tools for cooperative learning

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can design educational field problem-solving scenarios by applying the DAISI 6-step model
Learners can improve their instructional design drafts at least three times by incorporating peer feedback.
Participants execute at least two alternative instructional strategies in VR simulations.

resources: Social Studies Instructional Design Case Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
